question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the middle elevated level of the building on the right front. When you reach your current location, what is your direction to the middle area of the target building?  
choose:  
A. The middle area of the target building is on my right front side.  
B. The middle area of the target building is on my left rear side.  
C. I am currently close to the side facade of the middle area of the target building, located at ground floor level.  
D. I am currently at the edge of the middle area of the target building.  
E. I am currently close to the side facade of the middle floor area of the target building and am at the height of the middle floor.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The current perspective shows that the agent is at the height of the middle floor and is close to the side facade of the target building, which matches the description in option E.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(31, 32)]
Option: [E]
Reason: The video shows the agent is at the height of the middle floor and is close to the side facade of the target building.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The current perspective shows that the agent is at the height of the middle floor and is close to the side facade of the target building, which matches the description in option E.
